lead_paragraph: Introduced on Wednesday as New York City F.C.’s second head coach, Vieira, 39, was confident he would overcome his lack of coaching experience and unfamiliarity with M.L.S.
snippet: Introduced on Wednesday as New York City F.C.’s second head coach, Vieira, 39, was confident he would overcome his lack of coaching experience and unfamiliarity with M.L.S.

headline.main: N.Y.C.F.C.’s Patrick Vieira Acknowledges ‘Long Learning Process’
headline.print_headline: City F.C.’s New Manager Faces Unfamiliar League

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: New York City Football Club (Soccer Team)

abstract: Patrick Vieira, former midfielder for Arsenal and France, is introduced as new manager for New York City FC; has no experience as professional head coach and is unfamiliar with MLS, but is confident he can lead team.
